DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if apixaban is superior to placebo for preventing cardiovascular death, non-fatal myocardial infarction, or ischemic stroke in subjects with a recent acute coronary syndrome
DOC.criteria: Acute coronary syndrome (ACS) Clinically stable Receiving standard of care for ACS Severe hypertension Active bleeding or high risk for major bleeding Hemoglobin < 9 g/dL
